tests.name: Check 'count' in 'flowers_for_algernon' table
tests.query: SELECT count FROM flowers_for_algernon WHERE word = 'привет'

tests.name: Check 'count_uppercase' in 'flowers_for_algernon' table
tests.query: SELECT count_uppercase FROM flowers_for_algernon WHERE word = 'привет'

tests.name: Check there are not numbers in  'word'  for 'flowers_for_algernon' table
tests.query: SELECT CASE WHEN count(*) is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM flowers_for_algernon WHERE printf("%d", word) = word
